snippet: After years of marketing plans to employers, not individual consumers, health insurers are making radical changes because of the Affordable Care Act.
abstract: Health insurers are making radical changes because of the Affordable Care Act; many are re-examining years of marketing plans geared to employers, not individual consumers.
lead_paragraph: After years of marketing plans to employers, not individual consumers, health insurers are making radical changes because of the Affordable Care Act.

headline.seo: Florida Blue and Other Health Insurers Prepare for New Regulations
headline.main: Health Insurance Companies Get in Shape for 2014
